properties.description: Classifies a file into a bin based on its contents

output.description: Places the file into a folder (bin) that its classified into.

result.description: JSON response containing the bin to which the file was classified into

spec.title: Document classifier tool settings
spec.description: Classify documents based on their content

classificationBins.title: Classification bins
classificationBins.description: Specify at least two unique classification bins.

OPENAI_API_BASE.title: OpenAI API Base URL
OPENAI_API_BASE.description: The base URL for the OpenAI API

OPENAI_API_VERSION.title: OpenAI API Version
OPENAI_API_VERSION.description: The OpenAI API version to use

properties.description: This is a tool which can translate the given text into a target language.

output.description: Creates a file with the translated text

properties.description: This is a tool which can redact the PII (Personally Identifiable Information) data or information from a file.

input.description: File whose PII needs to be redacted

output.description: Creates a PDF file with PII redacted from it

result.description: Response containing the text with redacted PII

spec.title: PII Redactor tool settings
spec.description: Setup the document PII redactor tool

processor.title: Processor to use
processor.description: Service used to detect PII entities

redactionElements.title: PII elements to redact
redactionElements.description: PII elements to redact. Leave it empty to process all elements

scoreThreshold.title: Score Threshold
scoreThreshold.description: Minimum confidence needed to treat an entity as PII (from 0.0 to 1.0)

variables.title: Runtime Variables
variables.description: Runtime Variables for doc pii redactor

PII_REDACT_AWS_REGION.title: AWS Comprehend's Region
PII_REDACT_AWS_REGION.description: AWS Comprehend's region used in Document PII Redactor

PII_REDACT_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.title: AWS Comprehend's Access Key ID
PII_REDACT_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Comprehend's access key ID used in Document PII Redactor

PII_REDACT_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.title: AWS Comprehend's Secret Access Key
PII_REDACT_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Comprehend's secret access key used in Document PII Redactor

properties.description: Used to index documents in the specified vector DB / embedding.

input.description: Document that needs to be indexed

embeddingServices.title: Embedding to use
embeddingServices.description: Embedding service to use for indexing

vectorStores.title: Vector DB to use
vectorStores.description: Vector DB to use for indexing

textExtractors.title: Text extractor to use
textExtractors.description: Text extractor to use for indexing

spec.title: Document Indexer
spec.description: Index documents based on their semantic content

chunkSize.title: Chunk size
chunkSize.description: Size of chunks to be considered for the embedding. Smaller chunk size means embeddings are more precise, while larger chunk size means that the embeddings may be more general, but can miss fine-grained details.

chunkOverlap.title: Chunk overlap
chunkOverlap.description: Overlap to be considered for the embedding.

reIndex.title: Re-Index
reIndex.description: Re-index files every time (useful during development)

properties.description: The Text Extractor is a powerful tool designed to convert documents to its text form or Extract texts from documents

X2TEXT_HOST.description: The host where the x2text service is running

X2TEXT_PORT.title: X2Text service port
X2TEXT_PORT.description: The port where the x2text service is running
